name: GitHub Pixel
description: My style and typography tweaks for GitHub.
additional_info:
Source at github.com/razor-x/userstyles. GitHub's CSP blocks external fonts, so you will need to install them locally. This style uses the following fonts, and will fallback if some are missing:
  • Monoid
  • Inconsolata
  • Inconsolata-g
  • Noto Sans and Noto Emoji
  • Open Sans
2016-05-02
  • Set tab-size: 2 for GitHub code.
2016-01-21
  • Initial release.
